meanings.definition: Capable of being broken down or decomposed by light.
meanings.sent1: The photolysable plastic melted under the bright sun.
meanings.sent2: The photolysable dye changed color when placed in sunlight.
meanings.sent3: The photolysable paper decided to take a sunbath and disappeared!
meanings.sent4: Her trust was as fragile as a photolysable crystal in the sunlight.
meanings.sent5: The photolysable material vanished like magic under the sun's rays.

meanings.definition: Able to undergo a chemical reaction when exposed to light.
meanings.sent1: The photolysable solution turned blue when light touched it.
meanings.sent2: The photolysable compound reacted instantly to the UV light.
meanings.sent3: The photolysable substance threw a light party and changed colors!
meanings.sent4: His mood was as unpredictable as a photolysable substance under a spotlight.
meanings.sent5: The photolysable mixture fizzed and bubbled under the bright light.
